name.description: The name of the shell, which will be shown to Neuro and displayed in the terminal UI.

path.description: The absolute path to the shell executable. This will not be shown to Neuro.

args.description: Arguments to use when launching the shell. This will not be shown to Neuro.

terminals.description: An array of terminal names Neuro is allowed to use.

onLanguage.description: A list of languages this server's lint analysis will be sent.

sendOn.description: When to send linting problems from this workspace on. Overrides the global setting inside NeuroPilot settings.

allowed.description: A list of files Neuro is allowed to request/receive linting analysis on. Overrides the global Include/Exclude Patterns setting.

disallowed.description: A list of files Neuro is not allowed to request/receive linting analysis on. Overrides the global Include/Exclude Patterns setting.
